ygData.subject: question
ygData.msgSnippet: hey everyone. I joined this club to ask questions about Ever Quest. See, i dont have the game, but i m considering it. I just wanted to know if you all think
ygData.messageBody:
hey everyone. I joined this club to ask questions
about Ever Quest. See, i dont have the game, but i'm
considering it. I just wanted to know if you all think it's
worth it. Plus, what is it about exactly? Like, what do
you do in it? I've heard a little about it and
thought it sounded interesting, but i'm not entirely sure
what it's about. Is there a demo i could get
somewhere? I checked everquest.com and couldnt find one,
maybe i just missed it. thanks.
